title: A Day in the Life of Cowboy Mike and Winston
description: Here’s a book you’d like to see, Cowboy Mike has a friend he wants you to meet, On the Mountain Ranch, with Winston the Pony, Tag along; you’ll never feel lonely,The two pals spend their day as happy as can be, Meet friends roam the ranch wild and free, You learn something new with every page of the book,So what are you waiting for? Take a look. Presenting a new illustrated book for children, based on the adventures of a miniature pony and his owner, but more importantly, his best bud, Cowboy Mike. As the two pals roam the countryside, have your child feed their curiosity and learn something new with each page. Watch your child’s eyes light up as they immerse themselves in the vivid illustration etched with care and, most importantly, the love of learning and storytelling. A Day In The Life of Cowboy Mike and Winston is the perfect blend of entertainment and education. Make it a part of your children’s bedtime read as they fall asleep, only to wake up the next day wanting to spend their “day in the life” as productive as Cowboy Mike and Winston. Join Winston and Cowboy Mike on their Blue Mountain Ranch as they embark on their exciting adventures.To make things more wholesome, proceeds from each book purchase will go straight to a 501c3 charity named “Pony4Precious.” It is an organization set up by the real Cowboy Mike, who rescued a pony named Winston in 2016. The organization offers free online education and training programs for children all around the world. Let’s make every day in the life of our children prosperous.
author: Michael Eastwood
